text: A tree emblem is a tree or plant that is chosen by a country as a symbol or emblem for that country. ==Examples== Country Name of tree Scientific name Picture Reference Olive tree Olea europaea Banyan Ficus benghalensis Mango tree (Aam Gaachh) ("Cultural") Mangifera indica Bhutan Cypress Cupressus cashmeriana Ginkgo Ginkgo biloba Guanacaste Enterolobium cyclocarpum East Turkestan Common Mulberry Morus alba Banyan Ficus benghalensis Mediterranean cypress Cupressus sempervirens Caucasus Emirate Caucasian fir Abies nordmanniana Kashmir Chinar tree Platanus orientalis Coconut palm Cocos nucifera Sacred fig Ficus religiosa Cedrus deodara Himalayan deodar Olive tree Olea europaea Sikkim Rhododendron Rhododendron niveum Ceylon Ironwood Mesua ferrea == References == Category:Trees Category:Lists of plants Trees Category:Lists of countries
title: List of national trees
